SELECT t_depart_result.*, t_order_group_item.portfolio_project_id as portfolio_project_id, (CASE t_order_group_item.order_num WHEN t_order_group_item.order_num THEN t_order_group_item.order_num ELSE t_review_project.order_num END) as order_num_project, t_section_office.order_num as order_num_office FROM t_depart_result LEFT JOIN t_order_group_item ON t_order_group_item.id = t_depart_result.group_item_id LEFT JOIN t_review_project ON t_review_project.id = t_depart_result.group_item_id LEFT JOIN t_section_office ON t_section_office.id = t_depart_result.office_id WHERE t_depart_result.person_id = #{personId} and t_depart_result.del_flag = 0 and t_depart_result.group_item_id IN ( SELECT id FROM t_order_group_item WHERE group_id = #{groupId} AND del_flag = 0 union all SELECT id FROM t_review_project WHERE group_id = #{groupId} AND person_id = #{personId} and is_pass = 2 AND del_flag = 0 ) GROUP BY t_depart_result.group_item_id ORDER BY order_num_office,order_num_project,t_depart_result.create_date ASC
